headline: Block (XYZ) Surpasses Q2 Earnings Estimates
summary: Block (XYZ) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +3.33% and -4.17%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Block Raises 2025 Outlook as Gross Profit Improves
summary: The company behind payment systems Cash App and Square sees full-year gross profit, a key indicator for Block, increasing 14.4%, up from previous guidance of 12% growth.

headline: Pinterest Q2 profit miss, Block Q2 revenue miss, Take-Two Q1 beat
summary: Pinterest (PINS) stock falls after a second quarter profit miss. Block (XYZ) missed on second quarter revenue and earnings. Take-Two (TTWO) stock is climbing after a first quarter earnings beat, reporting $0.61 adjusted earnings per share (EPS) versus the $0.29 expected. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Block shares soar on strong gross profit growth despite EPS miss
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of Block Inc (NYSE:XYZ) jumped 8% in premarket trading Friday after the payments firm reported robust gross profit growth in the second quarter, defying an earnings miss. Strong gains in Cash App and Square segments helped lift investor sentiment as the company boosted its full-year outlook.

headline: Block raises annual profit forecast on resilient consumer spending; shares jump
summary: (Reuters) -Block reported a rise in second-quarter income and raised its annual gross profit forecast on Thursday, as the payments firm was helped by resilient consumer spending, lifting its shares 6% higher in extended trading.  The Jack Dorsey-led firm now expects 2025 gross profit of $10.17 billion, up from the $9.96 billion it forecast earlier.  "We saw a lot in the second quarter that gave us some healthy signs, some real encouragement around the products that are the key drivers of growth for us and the key drivers of acceleration in the second half," finance chief Amrita Ahuja said on a conference call.

raw.headline: Block raises annual profit forecast on resilient consumer spending; shares jump

The Jack Dorsey-led firm now expects 2025 gross profit of $10.17 billion, up from the $9.96 billion it forecast earlier.  "We saw a lot in the second quarter that gave us some healthy signs, some real encouragement around the products that are the key drivers of growth for us and the key drivers of acceleration in the second half," finance chief Amrita Ahuja said on a conference call.

headline: Block Announces Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/OAKLAND, Calif., August 07, 2025--Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) has posted its results for the second quarter of 2025 on the Financials section of its Investor Relations website at investors.block.xyz. Block will host a conference call and earnings webcast at 2:00 p.m. Pacific Time/5:00 p.m. Eastern Time today to discuss these financial results.
